channel.title: Ibm on make me: APe
channel.description: Recent content in Ibm on make me: APe

item.title: Started IBM internal LEVEL DEVil workshop series
item.description: LEVEL DEVil workshops Running a DevOps workshop for Poland colleagues in March was a one thing but from a day one I was quite sure I will do have to repeat it locally. Practicing DevOps and Continuous Delivery in company as IBM and for the enterprise customers might be a tough task. That’s nothing about enterprises, IBM is actually on a global level doing pretty much well in my eyes in the kind of internal transformation.
